## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G42000](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G42000)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtMT4a</u>
- **Gene Name:** Arabidopsis thaliana metallothionein 4a
- **Description:**   plant EC metallothionein family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2064617
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
